meanings.definition: Covered with short, sharp points or projections.
meanings.sent1: The muricated surface of the cactus made it difficult to touch.
meanings.sent2: The muricated shell of the sea urchin provided protection from predators.
meanings.sent3: The muricated texture of the sandpaper felt like tiny needles on my skin.
meanings.sent4: His muricated personality made it hard for others to get close to him.
meanings.sent5: The muricated fence surrounding the garden kept out unwanted visitors.

meanings.sent1: The muricated leaves of the plant scratched my arm as I brushed past.
meanings.sent2: The muricated bark of the tree was rough to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The muricated rug felt uncomfortable under my bare feet.
meanings.sent4: Her muricated tone in the email hinted at her annoyance.
meanings.sent5: The muricated texture of the fabric irritated my sensitive skin.
